title: list_all_catalogs
description: Verify that the GET /api/catalog endpoint returns a 200 status code and an array of all catalog objects stored in the SQLite database.

title: get_specific_catalog_by_filename
description: Verify that the GET /api/catalog/{filename} endpoint returns the correct catalog data for a valid filename with a 200 status code, and returns 404 for a non-existent filename.

title: save_update_catalog
description: Verify that the POST /api/catalog/{filename} endpoint successfully saves or updates a catalog with valid JSON data and returns a 200 status code, and returns 500 on error.

title: delete_catalog
description: Verify that the DELETE /api/catalog/{filename} endpoint deletes the specified catalog and returns a 200 status code.

title: list_all_estimates_with_metadata
description: Verify that the GET /api/estimates endpoint returns a 200 status code and an array of all estimates with their metadata.

title: save_update_estimate_with_atomic_transaction
description: Verify that the POST /api/estimates/{filename} endpoint saves or updates an estimate atomically with its backup using a three-phase commit pattern, returns 200 on success, 409 on conflict, and 500 on error.

title: rename_estimate_file
description: Verify that the PUT /api/estimates/{oldFilename}/rename endpoint renames an estimate file to a new filename and returns a 200 status code with the new filename.

title: create_manual_backup
description: Verify that the POST /api/backups/{id} endpoint creates a manual backup for the specified estimate ID and returns a 200 status code.

title: export_all_data_to_json
description: Verify that the GET /api/export/all endpoint exports all project data including backups as a complete JSON file and returns a 200 status code.

title: get_database_statistics
description: Verify that the GET /api/stats endpoint returns database statistics including counts and size with a 200 status code.
